Sec. 20-4. Initiated by individual or group.
Any person or group desiring a proposed boundary change to any municipality shall initiate the same by filing with the Clerk of the County Commission a written petition in substantially the form prescribed and furnished by the Director of the Office of Management and Budget which shall be accompanied by the documents and information prescribed in(A) through (F) hereof, together with a duly certified resolution of the governing body of the municipality involved approving such proposed boundary change, and shall give written notice to all owners of property within the area and within six hundred (600) feet thereof of his proposal for a boundary change. The cost of such notice shall be paid by the initiating individual or group.
